name: Warfronts: Battle For Toria!
summary:
Welcome to the islands of Toria, a kingdom of lords, castles… and war! Fight bandit clans in epic battles, unravel the secrets behind the bandit invasion and free this glorious island kingdom!

Get to the frontline in this addictive, free-to-play MMO strategy game. In Warfronts, the forces of good must battle a terrifying legion of enemies: clash on the field of battle, grow your village so that it can rise to the majesty of an epic castle kingdom, and test your strategy skills against rival clans! Build, battle and become lord of the mighty kingdom of Toria!
